name: DotWar
description:
A simple [really really simple] Local Multiplayer , 2D , top down shooter game.

This version : 2D , Local Multiplayer [ you can play with your friends using same WIFI ]

Next Version: 2D ... but Global Multiplayer

How To :

use WASD to move and Mouse Left Click to shoot :) ezpz

if you want the project files no problem...just keep that in mind that: i am not that good in Godot yet...
